alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Catoosa, western Whitfield and eastern Walker Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Wood Station, or 7 miles south of Ringgold, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Ringgold, Fort Oglethorpe, Chickamauga, Varnell, Tunnel Hill, Naomi, Noble, Indian Springs, Wood Station, Rocky Face, Blue Spring, Mill Creek, Boynton, Beaumont, Rock Spring and Fairview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
